description: A light snow jacket for the ski weekend from Tahoe to Tetons: The Cloud Bank consists of a two-layer Gore-Tex material and 100% recycled synthetic insulation. Thermally engineered to reduce weight while eliminating thermal bridges. Suitable for the toughest tracks with unparalleled warmth for the front country. This set covers the entire spectrum of your skiing adventures.
name: Mountain Hardwear Cloud Bank GTX LT Insulated Jacket - Mens
